title: Assignment Submission Reminder
message: Math homework for Grade 8B is due tomorrow. Please ensure your child submits the assignment on time.

title: Fee Payment Due
message: Quarterly fee payment is due in 3 days. Please make the payment to avoid late charges.

title: Exam Schedule Released
message: Mid-term examination schedule for February 2024 has been published. Check the academic portal for details.

title: Transportation Route Change
message: Bus route #12 will have a temporary detour from January 20-25 due to road construction. Check updated pickup times.

title: Health Checkup Reminder
message: Annual health checkup for Grade 6 students is scheduled for January 22nd. Please ensure your child attends.
